items.title: Jim Cramer on Keurig Dr Pepper: “I Don’t Want to Touch That One”
items.description: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) is one of the 12 stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. A caller asked if the company would be able to compete with Coca-Cola long term despite its “high debt”. In response, Cramer said: “Yeah, no, I don’t want to touch that one.
